modName: Sword of the King Mu-Ryeong - Korean
descriptionHtml:
General Lee Sam\'s Woldo link : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4561

Some people wanted 2handed version. so I modified this file. and Uploaded.

1. What is this?

This mod adds an craftable oriental Sword, yon may pronounce this (Hwan_Du_Dae_Do), which was used by The King Mu-Ryeong of Beak_Jae Daynasty. Mu-Ryeong was his Title as a king. His real name was Sama Yoong. Jus like my previous weapon mod(General Lee Sam\'s Moonblade-korean woldo), This weapon has it\'s own history, too. Maybe you need more information about the Baek_Jae Dynasty for understand and enjoy this mod more felicitously.

2. History about the sword

Baek_Jae dynasty(B.C 18~ A.D 660) is one of the Three ancient kingdonms of Korea. It was also called Nam_bu_Yew. The Civilization of this kingdom could be characterized by their delicate Architectures and relics. (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baekje) Contents of this page could be your references, if you want a bit more about the kingdom.

Anyway It is known fact that this sword was used by The King Mu-Ryeong, who was one of the brightest sovereign of the kingdom. The sword was excavated from the tumulus of the king(1971), and preserved since then.
Maybe you know the Samsung Corporation, the firm makes LED Tv and Galaxy S or something. Funny thing, The owner of this Corportaion is actually the owner of this sword, too. You may see the relic at the \"Samsung Museum of art, leeum\" in Korea.

The Type of word, \"Go_Ri_Kal\" is typically found all over the tumulus of Three kingdoms of Korea. Chinese calls this weaponry \"Hwan_Su_Do\", which was used widely during the Age of Han.

3. Specifications

- The Sword can be crafted.
- Also, you may enchance this sword as like deadric sword.
- The damage of the sword is exactly same as that of deadric sword.
- The length of the sword is roughly alike that of Iron sword.

4. Installation

Extract the 7z file to the Data folder in the Skyrim Installation Directory. And check the \".esp\" at the skyrim launcher, \"data files\" Tab.

5. Futher plans

I\'m planning to create some more Korean weapons.

That\'s all.

I hope you Enjoy This one, too.

- translate \"writestorm\" -
author: Lee
